components.description:
A metal device, dropped out of a boat to prevent it drifting away from the current location.

An anchor also refers to a place on a webpage that may be directlyÂ linked to, rather than simply loading a page and requiring a user to scroll to the correct location.

title: Anchor

version.description: The following characters we added to Unicode in 2005 and given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols -> Dictionary and map symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A metal device, dropped out of a boat to prevent it drifting away from the current location. An anchor also refers to a place on a webpage t http://emojipedia.org/anchor/
emoji_net_data.name: anchor

bn:13641423a: Having the extremities turned back, like the flukes of an anchor.

bn:00107165a: Connected with or belonging to or used in a navy
Of or relating to a navy.

bn:00093229v: To traverse or travel by ship on a body of water.
Traverse or travel on (a body of water)
To be impelled or driven forward by the action of wind upon sails, as a ship on water; to be impelled on a body of water by steam or other power.

bn:00071103n: A ship is a large buoyant watercraft.
A vessel that carries passengers or freight
A water-borne vessel generally larger than a boat.
Ships are large buoyant marine vessels.
A boat that by its size, solidity and power is appropriate for long navigations and big marine enterprises.

bn:00034131n: A ferry is a boat or ship used to carry primarily passengers, and sometimes vehicles and cargo as well, across a body of water.
A place where passengers are transported across water in such a ship.
A boat used to ferry passengers, vehicles, or goods across open water, especially one that runs to a regular schedule
A boat that transports people or vehicles across a body of water and operates on a regular schedule
A boat or a ship carrying passengers, and sometimes their vehicles, on short-distance, scheduled services.

bn:00011674n: A boat is a watercraft, usually smaller than most ships.
A watercraft designed to float or plane on, and provide transport over water.
A boat is a watercraft of any size designed to float or plane, to work or travel on water.
A small vessel for travel on water

apple_vendor_description: The anchor emoji on Apple devices is a robust, classic symbol rendered with a solid, metallic sheen and a deep, dark gray finish, showcasing Appleâ€™s commitment to realistic lighting and 3D depth. Its smooth, rounded edges and substantial form convey a sense of stability and security, embodying steadfastness and reliability. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is perfect for communicating a feeling of being grounded, secure, or committed to something important.
